items.introduction: Halten Sie sich an das Wesentliche.
items.slogan: Sagen Sie uns einfach was und wir erstellen Ihre maßgeschneiderte Software.
Collaborate with us and be surprised at what can be accomplished.
Small or large business, we don’t discriminate.
All your IT needs can be covered by us.

aboutUs.title: Über uns
aboutUs.about: Wir sind ein führendes Unternehmen für Digitalisierungs und Softwarehäuser.

main.firstPart: We at Swan IT Works know it can be tedious when cooperating gaining an agreement within the IT industry. Our diverse global team of business practitioners and specialists put
main.thirdPart: Yes, we’re a software house; however, we have diversified experience in production, services, hotel and trade management.

aboutUs.additionalText: All of us at Swan IT Works are happy to serve your business, whether it’s a small start-up or a large enterprise. Most of us are remote, although, if required we can come to you or meet in Central London. We work around you.

bestsData.title: Setzen Sie um, was wir predigen.
bestsData.text: We are more than digesters of code; we understand your needs like no other because we practice business.

bestsData.title: Use cutting edge technology.
bestsData.text: To ease learning, we use the latest technology. So our applications are the most efficient and fastest.

bestsData.title: Focus on quality yet deliver fast.
bestsData.text: Just like our software, we’re an agile and flexible workforce. We don’t want to be a large corporation.

whatWeDo.title: Was machen Wir
whatWeDo.description: Wenn Sie maßgeschneiderte Software benötigen, sind Sie bei Swan IT Works genau richtig. Wir arbeiten akribisch an Websites für komplizierte Anwendungen, die auf Business Intelligence basieren. Die Fähigkeiten unserer Entwickler sind unbegrenzte Erstellungssoftware für alle Geräte und Betriebssysteme.

things.title: Mobile Apps
things.info: Teilen Sie uns jedes gewünschte Design mit, und wir können es für Ihre mobile Android- oder iOS-App bereitstellen.

things.title: Web Apps
things.info: Using modern browsers, we can design anything, just tell us what you want for your web app.

things.title: Websites
things.info: We can build blogs, company websites, product configurators, and price comparison systems.

things.title: E-commerce
things.info: We are experienced in moving commerce online; it’s been our passion for the last ten years.

things.title: ERP Systems
things.info: Simplifying software is our primary speciality; as we know how hard it is to manage a business.

things.title: CMS Systems
things.info: Based on your needs and assumptions, we can build content management systems from scratch.

things.title: CRM Software
things.info: All of us know how customer relationship management is vital to survive; we can help you.

things.title: B2B Systems
things.info: Save more time for your company by allowing clients to order products or services directly.

things.title: Bespoke Software
things.info: Share with us your exciting software ideas, which we can custom build for you from scratch.

things.title: Automation processes
things.info: To save money, we automate invoice delivery and newsletter self sending to all your clients.

things.title: Integration of systems
things.info: We synchronise systems to work together and save you time by eliminating unnecessary work.

things.title: IT support
things.info: Our IT help is diverse, ask us, and we can provide our best quote for the service required.

ourTeam.title: meet the specialist
ourTeam.slogan: Our diverse team of professionals, take care of your IT needs.

people.name: Adrian Sobolewski
people.title: SALES EXECUTIVE
people.info: Adrian will guarantee that you will be served at the highest level. He will help develop your ideas and match the company's offer to your needs.

people.name: Konrad Olson
people.title: PYTHON DEVELOPER
people.info: Clean code lover, every bit matters to him. In a previous incarnation, he probably was a snake because Python has no secrets from him. In his spare time he is a fan of various types of beer and rock and roll.

people.name: Jessica Brown
people.title: BACK END DEVELOPER
people.info: Linux enthusiast, knows all commands by heart. He moves around the SQL database with deadly accuracy. No data is foreign to her, give her some characteristics and she will calculate the size of your shoe.
